meanings.definition: A device used to measure intraocular pressure in the eye.
meanings.sent1: The tonometers helped the doctor check the pressure in my eye.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had various tonometers to measure eye pressure accurately.
meanings.sent3: The tonometers in the clinic made funny beeping sounds during the eye check-up.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze felt like tonometers, probing deep into my soul.
meanings.sent5: The tonometers hummed softly as they measured the pressure inside the eye.
